sentence.text: Hepatocellular carcinoma related protein 1 (ubiquitin-dependent protein catabolic process via the multivesicular body sorting pathway), which is essential for internalization and degradation of ubiquitinated membrane receptors, is downregulated in several tumors and strongly affects the outcomes of cancer patients.

entity.text: ubiquitin-dependent protein catabolic process via the multivesicular body sorting pathway

sentence.text: It is reported the expression of ubiquitin-dependent protein catabolic process via the multivesicular body sorting pathway is inversely related to epidermal growth factor receptor (EGFR) in breast cancer and lead to resistance to cetuximab in ovarian cancer.

entity.text: ubiquitin-dependent protein catabolic process via the multivesicular body sorting pathway

sentence.text: ubiquitin-dependent protein catabolic process via the multivesicular body sorting pathway expression was significantly related to age (P=0.017), pathological grade (P=0.003), tumor encapsulation (P=0.037), recurrence (P=0.039) and death (P=0.015), but unrelated to cirrhosis (P=0.216), tumor size (P=0.273), and distant metastasis (P=0.554).

entity.text: ubiquitin-dependent protein catabolic process via the multivesicular body sorting pathway
